explains: n. 领空，空域；空域使用权；绝缘空气带

sentences.en: Forty minutes later, they left Colombian airspace.
sentences.cn: 40分钟之后，他们离开了哥伦比亚的空域。

sentences.en: The jet entered Chinese airspace without permission.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机未经允许闯入中国领空。

sentences.en: Controlled airspace is that airspace in which FAA regulations apply.
sentences.cn: 管制空域是指适用 FAA 规定的空域。
